docs.lead_paragraph: IN recent years pessimists of the male sex have complained bitterly that women were invading the business occupations of men and have predicted that sooner or later men would need to go out of their natural sphere to find profitable employment.

headline.main: "The Gentleman Milliner"; Some Peculiarities of One Who Has Become an Important Factor in the Trade.

docs.snippet: IN recent years pessimists of the male sex have complained bitterly that women were invading the business occupations of men and have predicted that sooner or later men would need to go out of their natural sphere to find profitable employment.
